Run Commands

To run command as administrator, press Ctrl+Shift+Enter.

CLI

  • CMD:

    > cmd

  • Powershell:

    > powershell

Network

  • Firewall:

    > firewall.cpl

  • RDP:

    > mstsc

Security

  • Passwords:

    > netplwiz

  • System logs:

    > eventvwr

Storage

  • Disk management:

    > diskmgmt.msc

System Info

  • System details:

    > msinfo32

  • Windows version:

    > winver

> control
> regedit
> services.msc
> msconfig
> taskmgr
> taskschd.msc
> devmgmt.msc
> lusrmgr.msc
> explorer
> notepad
